oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 1 from oral history interview with George Boyles, 1988 July 20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with George Boyles, conducted on 20 July 1988 by Mary Glenn Hearne. Boyles discusses the construction of several colleges in Nashville during the period 1910-1930, including Peabody College, Scarritt College, and the Southern YMCA Graduate College. The complete interview, as well as a partial index, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boyles, George Herbert, 1905-1997--Interviews
Vanderbilt University. Peabody College; George Peabody College of Education; Scarritt College for Christian Workers; Scarritt-Bennett Center; Young Men's Christian Association, Nashville
